summary: This is a confidential Daily Activity Report from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 5, 2019. It details staffing shortages, inmate counts, and administrative data, and notably records an inmate on suicide watch with an inmate companion. The document is dated August 6, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility.

events.title: Daily Operations at MCC New York
events.description: The Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York reported daily activities including staff shortages leading to vacated correctional assignments, an inmate placed on suicide watch with a companion, and standard inmate population counts.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The report is dated August 6, 2019, one day before Jeffrey Epstein's death in the same facility on August 10, 2019.
An inmate (I/M) was recorded as being on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion on August 5, 2019.
The report documents significant staff shortages across all shifts (Morning, Day, Evening), leading to vacated correctional assignments.
The total inmate population at the beginning of the morning watch shift on August 5, 2019, was 762.
The document is marked CONFIDENTIAL and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files related to Epstein.
